tool.name: neighbor joining
tool.description: Build a neighbor joining tree comparing samples

param.label: -i/--input_path: input path. directory for batch processing, filename for single file operation
param.name: input_path

tool.help: The input to this step is a distance matrix (i.e. resulting file from beta_diversity.py). The output is a newick formatted tree compatible with most standard tree viewing programs. Batch processing is also available, allowing the analysis of an entire directory of distance matrices.
